history.proof: rewrite <- (PeanoNat.Nat.sub_add 1 N). - sfirstorder depth: 3. - qsimpl time: 1.

exceptions.exn: In environment factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b p : nat Hp : p <> 0 expo_p_cancel : forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b -> a = b phi_Zp_eq : forall n r : nat, 〚 φ n r 〛 = 〚 fact r 〛 Psi_Zp_eq : forall n : nat, 〚 Ψ n 〛 = expoZp n 〚 fact (p - 1) 〛 Hprime : prime p phi_Zp_invertible : forall n r : nat, r < p -> Zp_invertible Hp 〚 φ n r 〛 Psi_Zp_invertible : forall n : nat, Zp_invertible Hp 〚 Ψ n 〛 n, N, n0, k, K, k0 : nat Hn : n = N * p + n0 Hk : k = K * p + k0 H1 : K < N H2 : n0 < k0 Hk0 : k0 < p H3 : p - (k0 - n0) < p Unable to unify "N - 1 + 1" with "S (N - 1 + 1 - 1)".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment factorial_cancel : forall n a b : nat, fact n * a = fact n * b -> a = b p : nat Hp : p <> 0 expo_p_cancel : forall n a b : nat, expo n p * a = expo n p * b -> a = b phi_Zp_eq : forall n r : nat, 〚 φ n r 〛 = 〚 fact r 〛 Psi_Zp_eq : forall n : nat, 〚 Ψ n 〛 = expoZp n 〚 fact (p - 1) 〛 Hprime : prime p phi_Zp_invertible : forall n r : nat, r < p -> Zp_invertible Hp 〚 φ n r 〛 Psi_Zp_invertible : forall n : nat, Zp_invertible Hp 〚 Ψ n 〛 n, N, n0, k, K, k0 : nat Hn : n = N * p + n0 Hk : k = K * p + k0 H1 : K < N H2 : n0 < k0 Hk0 : k0 < p H3 : p - (k0 - n0) < p Unable to unify "K < N" with "1 <= N".
